mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id as reviewId, r.reservation_id as reservationId, r.score, r.content, r.updatedAt FROM Review r left join Reservation r2 on r.reservation_id = r2.reservation_id WHERE r.status = 'ACTIVE' and r2.room_id = #{roomId} LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review (reservation_id, score, content, status) VALUES (#{review.reservation.id}, #{review.score}, #{review.content}, #{review.status})
